channel.title: hugo on Ding Jianhui 的个人博客 - 笔记
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Ding Jianhui 的个人博客 - 笔记

item.title: windows 开发环境下 go 交叉编译
item.description: linux set GOOS=linux set GOARCH=amd64 go build -o build/hugo main.go windows set GOOS=windows set GOARCH=amd64 go build -o build/hugo.exe main.go PS：环境变量参数参考： 1 2 GOARCH:amd64,386,arm,ppc64,…GOOS:lin
